titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Class Records, 1865-2021
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Emma Gronbeck, March 2025.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials from the various classes of Vassar College, mostly concerning graduation, reunion, and alumnae/i activities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Materials from the various graduating classes, including minutes and account books from class organizations, alumnae questionnaires, programs, bulletins, invitations, songbooks, reunion materials, clippings and articles on class members, and some notes and letters.

The records of the Class of 1889 include one volume of biographical sketches prepared for the 50th reunion, containing information on family, career, travels, and reminiscences of college years; one biography from a physician includes her reactions to studying with Carl Jung in the 1920s.
The records of the Class of 1914 inlclude 3 scrapbooks containing photographs, clippings, programs, and captions concerning the women in the class and their subsequent lives, circa 1910-1964.
The collection contains no records for the classes of 1945-4 or 1954.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into series for each graduating class, beginning in 1867 and ending 1979. Records of the classes of 1980 and later are grouped together. The last series in the collection consists of copper printing plates and printing blocks of class trees and class bookplates from 1868 to 1923. Materials within each series are arranged alphabetically by title.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Folder list created by Aurelia Harrison, February 2025. Updated by Emma Gronbeck, March 2025.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of various classes and individuals, as well as transfers from the Alumnae/i Association of Vassar College.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Class Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
